scripts.build:analyze: npm run build -- --stats-json && npx --yes webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/storefrontapp/stats.json
scripts.build: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,b2c,$SPA_ENV nx build storefrontapp --configuration production
scripts.build:asm: npm --prefix feature-libs/asm run build:schematics && nx build asm --configuration production
scripts.build:user: npm --prefix feature-libs/user run build:schematics && nx build user --configuration production
scripts.build:cart: npm --prefix feature-libs/cart run build:schematics && nx build cart --configuration production
scripts.build:cdc: npm --prefix integration-libs/cdc run build:schematics && nx build cdc --configuration production
scripts.build:cdp: npm --prefix integration-libs/cdp run build:schematics && nx build cdp --configuration production
scripts.build:cds: npm --prefix integration-libs/cds run build:schematics && nx build cds --configuration production
scripts.build:checkout: npm --prefix feature-libs/checkout run build:schematics && nx build checkout --configuration production
scripts.build:customer-ticketing: npm --prefix feature-libs/customer-ticketing run build:schematics && nx build customer-ticketing --configuration production
scripts.build:digital-payments: npm --prefix integration-libs/digital-payments run build:schematics && nx build digital-payments --configuration production
scripts.build:epd-visualization: npm --prefix integration-libs/epd-visualization run build:schematics && nx build epd-visualization --configuration production
scripts.build:order: npm --prefix feature-libs/order run build:schematics && nx build order --configuration production
scripts.build:libs: nx build core --configuration production && nx build storefrontlib --configuration production && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail npm:build:schematics npm:build:user && npm run build:cart && npm run build:pdf-invoices && npm run build:order && npm run build:storefinder && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail npm:build:checkout npm:build:asm npm:build:tracking npm:build:customer-ticketing && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail npm:build:organization npm:build:product npm:build:product-configurator npm:build:requested-delivery-date && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail npm:build:smartedit npm:build:qualtrics npm:build:assets npm:build:cds npm:build:cdc npm:build:cdp npm:build:digital-payments npm:build:epd-visualization npm:build:s4om npm:build:segment-refs npm:build:pickup-in-store npm:build:quote && npm run build:setup
scripts.build:organization: npm --prefix feature-libs/organization run build:schematics && nx build organization --configuration production
scripts.build:pdf-invoices: npm --prefix feature-libs/pdf-invoices run build:schematics && nx build pdf-invoices --configuration production
scripts.build:pickup-in-store: npm --prefix feature-libs/pickup-in-store run build:schematics && nx build pickup-in-store --configuration production
scripts.build:product: npm --prefix feature-libs/product run build:schematics && nx build product --configuration production
scripts.build:product-configurator: npm --prefix feature-libs/product-configurator run build:schematics && nx build product-configurator --configuration production
scripts.build:s4om: npm --prefix integration-libs/s4om run build:schematics && nx build s4om --configuration production
scripts.build:segment-refs: npm --prefix integration-libs/segment-refs run build:schematics && nx build segment-refs --configuration production
scripts.build:qualtrics: npm --prefix feature-libs/qualtrics run build:schematics && nx build qualtrics --configuration production
scripts.build:requested-delivery-date: npm --prefix feature-libs/requested-delivery-date run build:schematics && nx build requested-delivery-date --configuration production
scripts.build:storefinder: npm --prefix feature-libs/storefinder run build:schematics && nx build storefinder --configuration production
scripts.build:smartedit: npm --prefix feature-libs/smartedit run build:schematics && nx build smartedit --configuration production
scripts.build:tracking: npm --prefix feature-libs/tracking run build:schematics && nx build tracking --configuration production
scripts.build:quote: npm --prefix feature-libs/quote run build:schematics && nx build quote --configuration production
scripts.generate:publish:docs: npm run generate:docs && npm run publish:docs
scripts.test:all-schematics: npm --prefix ./projects/schematics test -- -u; for dir in feature-libs/* integration-libs/*; do (cd $dir && npm run test:schematics -- -u); done
scripts.test:libs: concurrently "nx test core --code-coverage" "nx test storefrontlib --code-coverage" "nx test cart --code-coverage" "nx test organization --code-coverage" "nx test storefinder --code-coverage" "nx test smartedit --code-coverage" "nx test asm --code-coverage" "nx test qualtrics --code-coverage" "nx test product --code-coverage" "nx test product-configurator --code-coverage" "nx test customer-ticketing --code-coverage" "nx test cdc --code-coverage" "nx test cdp --code-coverage" "nx test setup --code-coverage" "nx test checkout --code-coverage" "nx test order --code-coverage" "nx test digital-payments --code-coverage" "nx test epd-visualization --code-coverage" "nx test pickup-in-store --code-coverage" "nx test s4om --code-coverage" "nx test requested-delivery-date --code-coverage" "nx test pdf-invoices --code-coverage" "nx test quote --code-coverage"
scripts.dev:ssr: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,b2c,$SPA_ENV cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 nx run storefrontapp:serve-ssr
scripts.prerender:dev: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,$SPA_ENV cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 nx run storefrontapp:prerender --routes-file projects/storefrontapp/prerender.txt
scripts.prerender:cds: env-cmd --no-override -e cds nx run storefrontapp:prerender --routes-file projects/storefrontapp/prerender.txt
scripts.dev:cds:ssr: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,b2c,cds cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 nx run storefrontapp:serve-ssr
scripts.prerender:cds:dev: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,cds cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 nx run storefrontapp:prerender --routes-file projects/storefrontapp/prerender.txt
